body.p:
The PowerPak 2 PDU weight varies by configuration and the configuration is highly customizable. The following are approximate PDU weights:
Main Cabinet with 400 kVA transformer, approximately 3000 lbs.
24" Side Car, approximately 585 lbs.
12" Side Car, approximately 500 lbs.
Weights vary by selection of components. Floor stands are available for supporting the main cabinet, which houses the transformer and therefore most of the PDUâ€™s weight. See .
